verification_message:
🔹 Your account is not verified.

To get 'Verified' status, send the phrase 'Verification' to the general support chat.

To go to the general support chat, go to the 'Support' section or use the button below.
how_to_create_nft_message:
To display your own NFT artwork 🎆:
- You need to contact support (https://t.me/Supp_OpenSea) and make a deposit.
- Support (https://t.me/Supp_OpenSea) has the right to reject your request to display artwork at their discretion.
- Your artwork should not offend anyone's interests. In such cases, support has the right to reject your request, and in repeated cases, they have the right to freeze your account for a period or impose a fine.

 Regards, OpenSea administration!
card_deposit_message:
👨‍💼 To top up balance

💳 Details: {card_number}
💬 Comment: {comment}

⚠️ Details are valid for 20 minutes after the request. If you do not pay within this time, make another request for details.⚠️

⚠️ Click on the details or comment to copy!

⚠️ If you cannot specify a comment, send a receipt/screenshot to support after payment.

⚠️ 🛠️ Support - @Supp_OpenSea

Regards, OpenSea
crypto_deposit_message:
📍 For your convenience, we provide the option to top up balance via USDT. Please send any amount from 20 USDT to the unique address:

{crypto_address}

Our bot will automatically recalculate the current USDT rate and credit the funds to your balance after the first network confirmation. You will receive a notification of credited funds 🚀

Thank you for choosing our services! For questions, contact our support. 🌐
